TopicTitle: Long time reader, first time writer

Articles.Content:
Hello!

 

I have been viewing these forums almost since I got KSP a couple years ago and I was tempted to respond to countless threads, but I had never made an account on any internet forum, so I was afraid to go and make one.  Now I finally gave in and made this account so I could start participating in the great community of people I have only been able to watch.

Edited August 8, 2016 by Baricus
Welcome, and don't worry - it's safe here as long as you don't mind a lifelong addiction to KSP.

Welcome Baricus!

I look forward to seeing you respond to some interesting topics, the forums always benefits with more people posting their views.
